mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodReWhsgNtcn Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ RE_WHSG_NTCN_SN , GOD_NO , ITM_NO , SET_GOD_NO , MBR_NO , NTCN_SECT_CD , MBR_EMAIL , MOBIL_AREA_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , MOBIL_NATION_NO , NTCN_COMPT_YN , DELETE_YN , STPLAT_IEM_AGR_YN , STPLAT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_RE_WHSG_NTCN WHERE 1 = 1 AND RE_WHSG_NTCN_SN = #{reWhsgNtcnSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteGodReWhsgNtcn Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM GOD_RE_WHSG_NTCN WHERE 1 = 1 AND RE_WHSG_NTCN_SN = #{reWhsgNtcnSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
